width.comment: The width of the menu icon on narrow viewports in the Masthead.

height.comment: The height of the menu icon on narrow viewports in the Masthead.

bg-color.comment: The background color of the Masthead.

padding.comment: The padding around the content section in the Masthead on wide viewports.

padding-wide.comment: The padding of the Masthead content, menu, and branding sections.

item-padding-top.comment: The padding top around the content items in the content section of the Masthead.

item-padding-top-wide.comment: The padding top around the content items in the content section of the Masthead in wide viewports.

item-padding-bottom.comment: The padding bottom around the content items in the content section of the Masthead.

item-padding-bottom-wide.comment: The padding bottom around the content items in the content section of the Masthead in wide viewports.

item-padding-right.comment: The padding right around the content items in the content section of the Masthead.

item-padding-right-wide.comment: The padding right around the content items in the content section of the Masthead in wide viewports.

item-padding-left.comment: The padding left around the content items in the content section of the Masthead.

item-padding-left-wide.comment: The padding left around the content items in the content section of the Masthead in wide viewports.

visited-color.comment: The visited state color of Masthead links.

icon-hover-color.comment: The color of Masthead Icon Links on hover.

font-weight.comment: The font weight for Masthead links.

border-bottom-size.comment: The size of the bottom border on the Masthead.

border-bottom-style.comment: The bottom border style on the Masthead.

border-bottom.comment: The bottom border on the Masthead.

border-bottom-wide.comment: The bottom border on the Masthead on wide viewports.

site-links-border-right.comment: The right border on the site links in the Masthead.

breakpoint.comment: The point at which the Masthead navigation switches from narrow viewport style to large viewport style.

column-width.comment: The maximum width of the Masthead.

logo-max-width.comment: The maximum width of the logo in the Masthead.

logo-min-width.comment: The minimum width of the logo in the Masthead.

shadow.comment: The box shadow of the Masthead.

shadow-wide.comment: The box shadow of the Masthead in wide viewports.

shadow-scroll.comment: The Masthead shadow that gets applied when the page is scrolled.

border.comment: The border of the Selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

padding.comment: The padding of the Selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

min-width.comment: The minimum width of the Selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

font-color.comment: The font color of the selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

bg-color.comment: The background color of the selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

border-color-mask-open.comment: The bottom color that gets applied to the selector dropdown when open, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

border-radius.comment: The border radius of the selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the selector, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-z-index.comment: The z-index of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-font-size.comment: The font size of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-font-weight.comment: The font weight of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-margin.comment: The margin of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-padding.comment: The padding of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-item-padding.comment: The padding around the Selector Dropdown items, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

size.comment: The font size of the Selector Dropdown title, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

weight.comment: The font weight of the Selector Dropdown title, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

color.comment: The color of the Selector Dropdown title, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-link-color.comment: The color of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-link-padding.comment: The padding of the Selector Dropdown links, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-text-decoration.comment: The text decoration of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-line-height.comment: The line height of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

background-color.comment: The background color of the Selector Dropdown items that are active or hovered. Found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

border.comment: The left border of the Selector Dropdown item that is active. Found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

box-shadow.comment: The box-shadow of the Selector Dropdown item that is active. Found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-footer-padding.comment: The padding around the Selector Dropdown footer, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-footer-text-align.comment: The text-align of the Selector Dropdown, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-border-bottom-mask-open.comment: The bottom border that gets applied to the selector dropdown when open, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

dropdown-box-shadow-mask-open.comment: The box shadow that gets applied to the selector dropdown when open, found in a Masthead with Extended Navigation.

narrow-height.comment: This is the height of the Masthead on narrow viewports and is used to calculate how far from the top the narrow navigation items should be displayed.

mask-color.comment: The color of the mask that gets applied when the Masthead selector dropdown is open on narrow screens.

transition.comment: The transition applied to the Masthead.

translateY.comment: The transform length that gets applied when the Masthead scrolls out of view on narrow screens.

left-border.comment: The left border of the active item in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

background-color.comment: The background color of the active item in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

heading-font-weight.comment: The font weight of the active item heading in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

font-color.comment: The font color of the active item in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

heading-color.comment: The font color of the active item in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

font-color.comment: The font color of the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

open-line-background-color.comment: The color of the line on open items in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

open-line-height.comment: The height of the line on open navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

padding.comment: The padding of the items in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

text-align.comment: The text alignment of the items in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

border.comment: The border of the items in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

background.comment: The background of the items in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the heading in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

color.comment: The color of the heading in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the details in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

font-color.comment: The font color of the details in the navigation links when masthead is on narrow viewports.

simple-link-icon-hover-color.comment: The color of Simple Masthead Icon Links on hover.

column-width.comment: The maximum width of the big navigation items in the navigation bar in the Masthead Extended.

bg.comment: The background color of the big navigation bar in the Masthead Extended.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the big navigation link in the Masthead Extended.

hover-border-bottom.comment: The border-bottom of the links in the big nav item when the big nav item is hovered in the Masthead Extended.

padding.comment: The padding of the big navigation links in the Masthead Extended.

active-color.comment: The underline color of the active big navigation item in the Masthead Extended.

border-bottom.comment: The border bottom of the big navigation items in the Masthead Extended.

active-border-bottom.comment: The border bottom of the active big navigation items in the Masthead Extended.

open-border-bottom.comment: The border bottom of open big navigation items in the Masthead Extended.

line-height.comment: The line height of the big navigation items in the Masthead Extended.
